participant_1.background:
On the weekend I like to go to the beach to relax and have fun.
I love my green tea set
I love the fact that my job allows me to travel and meet new people.
I'm not sure if Comic Con is my thing
i can recite the movie young frankenstein word for word.

participant_2.background:
I'd have lunch with myself
i like reading horror novels.
my purse has a picture of a skunk on it.
i have been married for 20 years.
i do not have a job and sit on the couch all day.

content.text: Hello there! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read horror novels and watch movies.  How about you?
I love going to the beach! I also enjoy reading and watching movies.  Do you have a favorite horror novel?
I really like "Pet Sematary".  It is a classic.  What do you think?
I haven't read that one yet, but I have heard good things about it.  It's on my list!  What kind of movies do you like?
I like all sorts of movies, but my favorite genre is horror.  How about you?
I like horror movies, too.  I also enjoy comedies and action movies.  I'm not a big fan of drama movies.
I can't stand drama movies.  They are so boring!  I like to be entertained when I watch a movie.
Me too!  I like to laugh and be scared.  What are some of your favorite movies?
I like "The Conjuring" movies, "The Ring", "The Sixth Sense", and "The Blair Witch Project".  What are some of your favorites?
I love "The Conjuring" movies, too!  I also like "The Shining", "The Exorcist", and "A Nightmare on Elm Street".
Those are all great movies!  I love horror movies!  I'm so glad that we have something in common.
Me too!  It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
Yes, it is!  I'm glad we met.
Me too!  It was nice talking to you.
You too!  Have a great day!
